title: Chemistry Education Scenario Design Utilizing Local Cultural Resources

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Chemistry Theory (Including Colloid Stability and Aggregation), Foundational Pedagogical Skills, and General Understanding of Local Cultural Resources
context.additional_context: For Pre-Service/In-Service Teachers, Focused on Integrated Educational Design Combining Chemistry Theory and Local Cultural Resources. Asynchronous Learning Environment Utilizing Digital Devices

learning_goals: Learners can design situational learning by linking chemical education content (colloid stability and coagulation) with local cultural resources.
Learners can create teaching-learning materials that integrate chemical theories and local cultural elements using digital tools.
Learners can design formative assessment tools to measure learners' understanding of chemical concepts and the development of cultural identity.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
